Description: 82/83 Fender Japan JV Stratocaster Extremely Rare ST57-65 LH LEFT HANDED w/box! Up for sale is a guitar that only comes up once or twice a year (maybe!) the Left Handed JV stratocaster. SOOOOO few of these were ever made.To top it off, you get something that you also almost never see---the ORIGINAL JV box. I personally have sold many dozens of JV's and never ever ever seen an original box. There has, as far as I know, NEVER been an original JV box for sale on ebay before until now. The guitar plays and sounds great. See pics for details. Yes it is all original. Grey bobbin pickups with factory fullerton stamp on them. This one will NOT last as there are far more JV collectors that are left handed than there are lefty guitar JV's. Weight of guitar: 3.5 kg includes original tremolo bar as well, and the original Fender strap (most likely from the fullerton factory) that came with guitar Good luck! -Pro Audio Japan ibanez j-custom
